title: Trump, China trade talks move closer to extending tariff truce
shortDescription: The United States and China appear to be moving toward extending a 90-day trade truce between the two countries, but President Trump must sign off.

title: Trump met teenage Epstein victim, a contestant in his beauty pageant
shortDescription: One of four survivors who testified at Ghislaine Maxwell's trial is one of the few who has brought up Trump. She didn't accuse him of wrongdoing.

title: See list of Trump golf courses around the world after Scotland opening
shortDescription: President Trump attended an opening at the Trump International Scotland resort for a new golf course. Where are the other Trump National Golf courses?

title: Ghislaine Maxwell says she will talk to Congress, but there's a catch
shortDescription: Ghislaine Maxwell says she is willing to testify before Congress on what she knows about Jeffrey Epstein, but she has conditions.

title: See inside President Trump's new Scotland golf course
shortDescription: President Donald Trump ended his trip to Scotland promoting one of his new golf properties, an 18-hole course at Trump International Golf Links.

title: Trump DOJ targets judge who blocked deportation flights
shortDescription: Attorney General Pam Bondi said she ordered her agency to file a complaint against James Boasberg, the judge who blocked Trump's deportation flights.

title: Trump calls Manhattan shooting suspect 'crazed lunatic'
shortDescription: A gunman killed at least four people, including a New York City police officer, on July 28 in Manhattan while Trump was on a trip to Scotland.

title: GOP lawmaker introduces bill to rename Kennedy Center after Trump
shortDescription: Rep. Bob Onder, R-Missouri, introduced a bill that would designate the Kennedy Center as the “Donald J. Trump Center for Performing Arts.”

title: Trump's 'working trip' to Scotland includes opening a new golf course
shortDescription: The White House defended Donald Trump's stay at two golf properties during a "working visit" to Scotland that included meetings with European leaders.

title: Trump's trade talks intensify as tariff deadline closes in
shortDescription: TACO or tariffs? An August 1 deadline looms after the European Union became the latest of the top US trading partners to reach a deal with Trump.

title: The Trump administration has doubled down its attacks on trans rights
shortDescription: Politically, the issue of transgender athletes has galvanized Republicans. Democrats are still figuring out where they stand.

title: Trump admin slashed federal funding for gun violence prevention
shortDescription: The Trump administration has terminated more than half of all federal funding for gun violence prevention programs in the U.S.

title: Library e-books on the line as Congress, Trump consider spending cuts
shortDescription: Like checking out library e-books? Trump, Congress could make it harder by cutting federal funding for libraries.

title: New 'armored' golf cart joins Trump's security detail in Scotland
shortDescription: The black vehicle appeared to be armored with tinted window as it followed Trump on the golf course.

title: Trump's jumbo jet gift is 'unconditional,' Pentagon memo says
shortDescription: According to a memo signed by Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth and Qatari officials, the free Boeing 747 is a "bona fide gift."

title: Trump addresses falling out with Epstein: 'He stole people from me'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he cut ties with friend Jeffrey Epstein because the wealthy financier and sex offender "stole people that worked for me."

title: Trump has 'nothing to hide' in Epstein case, Vance says
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance said President Donald Trump wants "full transparency" in the Epstein case.

title: Trump accused of cheating in golf (again) after viral video
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has been accused of cheating at golf after a video went viral. The President has been in Scotland this weekend at Turnberry.

title: Trump slashes Ukraine peace deadline
shortDescription: President Donald Trump cut the Russia-Ukraine peace deadline from 50 to 10 days, saying he's "disappointed" in the Russian president.

title: Senate Dems demand DOJ share Ghislaine Maxwell interview tapes
shortDescription: The ranking Democrat on DOJ oversight committee fears 'a corrupt bargain between the Trump Administration' and the convicted Jeffrey Epstein associate

title: President Trump gives Russia less than two weeks to end war in Ukraine
shortDescription: President Donald Trump warned Russia it has "10 to 12" days to agree to a ceasefire with Ukraine or face US sanctions and tariffs.

title: Trump again denies Epstein letter
shortDescription: President Donald Trump explained his falling out with Jeffrey Epstein during a meeting with the British prime minister in Scotland.

title: First Amendment: What to know about Trump's lawsuit against WSJ
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's lawsuit against the Wall Street Journal, filed in South Florida, raises potential First Amendment concerns. Here's why.

title: Trump's Planned Parenthood cuts blocked by judge
shortDescription: District Judge Indira Talwani issued a preliminary injunction, saying Trump's tax and spending law targeted Planned Parenthood's health centers.

title: Florida law could allow WSJ to 'SLAPP' Donald Trump with attorney fees
shortDescription: Florida's anti-SLAPP laws could cost Donald Trump attorney fees to the Wall Street Journal in his federal libel lawsuit.

title: Trump says he's 'allowed' to pardon Maxwell, never went to Epstein island
shortDescription: Maxwell is serving 20 years in prison for conspiring with Epstein to sexually abuse minors. Critics are calling on the Trump to release more information.
